name: tm01
effect: Teaches Focus Punch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hone Claws to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Focus Punch Gen II: DynamicPunch Gen I: Mega Punch)

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user focuses its mind before launching this attack. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.
flavor_text.platinum: The user focuses its mind before launching this attack. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user focuses its mind before launching this attack. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.
